Building instructions for Terrabrowser.

===Building Requires===
  * Mac OS X 10.4 or later
  * Xcode
  * Interface Builder
  * Other [http://code.google.com/p/chimoosoftcocoa/ shared Chimoosoft code] to be located in a directory called chimoosoftcocoa next to the kissphrase trunk directory.

===Building Instructions===
  * Build as usual.

===Other Notes===

You will see many compile time warnings which should be addressed.  Feel free to fix them up!
